variables.name: Auto Install
variables.description: Auto run npm install on start

install.script:
#!/bin/bash
cd /home/container

if [ ! -f package.json ]; then
  echo '{"name":"app","type":"module","main":"index.js"}' > package.json
fi

if [ ! -f index.js ]; then
  echo 'console.log("Hello from Sodium!");' > index.js
fi

if [ -f package.json ] && [ "$AUTO_INSTALL" = "true" ]; then
  npm install
fi

echo "Installation complete!"
